summary: Replaces Solitude's housecarl, Jordis, with my own, Ania.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces Solitude's housecarl, Jordis, with my own, Ania. Which means she has the same combat data and everything other than her appearance, name, inventory, class, and outfit. Ania's level scales with the player to 75, with her max health being 1075, magicka 380, and stamina 1005 (I made her a special little class).

For uninstallation, tell her to wait in an empty cell that you will likely not enter again, save, and [i]then[/i] uninstall. DO NOT marry Ania if you plan to uninstall or you won't be able to remarry.
author: Fs97
